excerpt: "PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) today unveiled its grand plans to invest $1 billion in expanding and scaling its artificial intelligence (AI) portfolio over the next three years. The significant investment aims to assist clients in completely reimagining their business workflows through generative AI."
